report_title: 2025 Bug Bounty Earnings Analysis & Landscape Report

executive_summary.market_overview: The 2025 bug bounty market exhibits a strong power-law distribution. Record total payouts (HackerOne >$81M, Immunefi >$100M) are offset by high inequality, where the top 5% of hunters capture >90% of revenue.
executive_summary.key_trend: Web3 and AI sectors offer the highest 'price-per-bug', while traditional Web2 platforms offer volume and consistency.

immunefi.key_insight: Highest payouts in the industry. Surpassed $100M in total payouts. Single critical bugs can net $1M - $10M.

hackerone.key_insight: Largest volume of programs. Top 30 hackers have >$1M lifetime earnings. 13% YoY growth in total payouts.

synack.key_insight: 'Bounty on Triage' model guarantees payment upon acceptance, providing more stable income than other platforms.

code4rena.key_insight: Competitive audit model. Top teams can earn ~$20k in 2-week sprints.

bugcrowd.key_insight: Good entry point. 61% of hackers say it helped them find a job. High competition on public programs.

beginner.description: Steep learning curve. Income is sporadic and relies on low-hanging fruit (IDORs, simple logic bugs). High rate of duplicates/invalid reports.

intermediate.description: Consistent findings in average programs. specialized knowledge (e.g., OAuth, GraphQL) begins to pay off. Can find 2-3 medium/high bugs monthly.

pro_full_time.description: Treats hunting as a business. Earnings rival senior engineering salaries. Access to private programs reduces competition.

elite.description: Specializes in criticals (RCE, chain exploits, fund draining). One bug can equal a year's salary. Lifetime earnings >$1M.

real_success_stories.details: Earned in a single 2-week audit of the Ronin network (Oct 2024).
